t:
I held my breath as the intruder passed by the bedroom closet, praying he won't peek inside.



If the officer discovers the bodies I've hidden there, I'm in deep trouble.
c:
I noticed the suspect grew anxious as I approached the closet, prompting me to open it. To my astonishment, I realized I wasn't the only one with this morbid hobby.



#intruder #hobby #secret #horror #twist #police #revelation #surprise
